docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This documentation provides comprehensive information about KFabrik.

docs.title: Documentation Guidelines
docs.text:
• Use clear, concise language
  • Include code examples where applicable
  • Follow markdown best practices

docs.title: Making Changes
docs.text:
1. Fork the repository
  2. Create a feature branch
  3. Make your changes
  4. Test locally with mkdocs serve
  5. Submit a pull request

docs.title: File Organization
docs.text:
• Place new documentation in the docs/ directory
  • Update mkdocs.yml navigation when adding new pages
  • Use descriptive filenames with hyphens

docs.title: Local Development
docs.text:
mkdocs serve

Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000 to view the documentation locally.
